alert.note: Alert for Adair; Boyle; Casey; Garrard; Lincoln; Madison; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:12AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, southeastern Garrard, north central Russell, southeastern Boyle, southeastern Madison, Casey and northeastern Adair Counties through 945 AM EST/845 AM CST/... At 912 AM EST/812 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danville to 7 miles northeast of Columbia. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Stanford around 915 AM EST. Lancaster around 920 AM EST. Liberty around 930 AM EST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST/noon CST/ for south central and central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Boyle; Casey; Garrard; Lincoln; Madison; Russell
